notesStmt.note: Joseph Bonaventura da Vigevano: inscribed in the colophon (folio 200r).Censored by Giovanni Domenico Carretto, Italian censor (active 1600-1624): inscribed with his name, 1620 (folio 286v); see 100-101, and appendix § 80-84. Censored by Dominico Irosolomitano, Italian censor (active 1575-1624): inscribed with his name (folio 287r); see 61, and appendix § 62-74. Censored by Fr. Hippolytus, Italian censor: inscribed with his name, 1601 (folio 287r).Images of the head, tail, and fore-edge will display as f.viii-r, f.viii-v and f.ix-r respectively.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Special portions for Rosh ḥodesh, Purim, Hanukah, etc.

collation.p: Quires of originally 10 leaves each, marked with catchwords at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian square script of the 15th century. Partially punctuated. Avraham Farissol of Ferrara: inscribed with his name in the colophon (folio 200r).
